required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of AMG531(Romiplostim) in Patients With Aplastic Anemia
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2/3 Study of AMG531 in Patients With Aplastic Anemia PreviouslyUntreated With Immunosuppressive Therapy

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the hematological responses based on the response assessment criteria when AMG531 is subcutaneous (SC)-administered with anti-human thymocyte immunoglobulin (ATG) + ciclosporin A (CsA) therapy for 6 months in patients with aplastic anemia (AA) who were previously untreated with immunosuppressive therapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Achievement of complete response (CR) or partial response (PR)

secondary_outcome.measure: The time to CR or PR
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Each time point evaluated weekly until Week 27

secondary_outcome.measure: Reduction or independence of platelet and/or erythrocyte transfusion
Change from baseline in platelet count (/µL)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Each time point evaluated weekly until Week 27

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in hemoglobin (Hb) concentration (g/dL)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Each time point evaluated weekly until Week 27

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in neutrophil count (/µL)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Each time point evaluated weekly until Week 27

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in reticulocyte count (/µL)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Each time point evaluated weekly until Week 27

intervention.description: Romiplostim SC. Initial dose is 10 ug/kg/. Maximum dose is 20 ug/kg. Original duration is 6 months from first administration but if investigator decide that the patient is needed more treatment, they move to extention period and take treatment up to 1 year.
